entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:09 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -15.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 9:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -15.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -19.1°C
Wind: WSW 53 km/h gust 84 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 100. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:09 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:09 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:09 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
